name: Show_Ges_columns
action:
<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(MSC_Addi_Labor_GES_%,MSC_Engineering_Labor_GES_%)*>
<*CTX ( Container(MSC_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES Eng).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(MSC_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES Eng % Split).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(MSC_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES_Unit_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(MSC_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(MSC_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES_ListPrice).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(MSC_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES_WTW_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(MSC_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES_MPA_Price).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(MSC_Additional_Labour_Container).Column(GES Eng).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(MSC_Additional_Labour_Container).Column(GES Eng % Split).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(MSC_Additional_Labour_Container).Column(GES_Unit_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(MSC_Additional_Labour_Container).Column(GES_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(MSC_Additional_Labour_Container).Column(GES_ListPrice).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(MSC_Additional_Labour_Container).Column(GES_WTW_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(MSC_Additional_Labour_Container).Column(GES_MPA_Price).SetPermission(Hidden) )*>
